entries.name: source
entries.desc: The Gem::Source that gems are fetched from

entries.name: uri
entries.desc: The corresponding place to fetch gems.

entries.name: new(dep_uri = 'https://rubygems.org/api/v1/dependencies')
entries.desc: Creates a new APISet that will retrieve gems from uri using the RubyGems API URL dep_uri which is described at guides.rubygems.org/rubygems-org-api

entries.name: find_all(req)
entries.desc: Return an array of APISpecification objects matching DependencyRequest req.

entries.name: prefetch(reqs)
entries.desc: A hint run by the resolver to allow the Set to fetch data for DependencyRequests reqs.
